title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Learning Analytics-Based Collaborative Learning Activity Design and Operational Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Can suggest three or more improvement plans for collaborative learning activity design using learning analytics metrics
Can analyze real-time learning participation data to enable immediate instructional adjustments within 5 minutes during class
Can develop redesigned activities satisfying over 80% of learners based on analysis reports from collaborative learning tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
